Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Temple of lord bhairav
Review: There are various forms of lord bhairav , vikrant bhairav is one of the form , its a small temple , you can find few visitors at this place

Name: rathod2017
Title: Vikrant Bhairav Shrine
Review: Vikrant Bhairav Shrine, this temple is also dedicated to lord Kaal Bhairav. there is a huge idol of the lord.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: One of the nine bhairavars
Review: There are nine temples exclusively dedicated to nine forms of bhairavars in the city of ujjain like kasi and this is one form of bhairavar

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Huge Idol
Review: Vikrant Bhairav Shrine is dedicated to Lord Vikramaditya and has a huge idol of the Lord.This is a very famous temple

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Temple of the KING
Review: The temple of King Vikramadatya of Ujjain. Very huge idol of king is established in the temple. It is recommended to visit at Ujjain

Name: Hiten_Rathod
Title: Rewind your childhood stories - Vikram & Vaital,
Review: During my first visit to Ujjain made it a point to visit this place as heard and read many stories of famous Vikram and Vaital specially being a Gujarati.Visit to this place refreshed and rewound all those memoirs and felt alive.Though a small place but whoever has heard of Vikram and Vaital would definitely visit this place once if in Ujjain specially to familiarise our young generation of our legacy.Share the story of a shephard who used to sit on a sand mound and deliver judgements which used to be so perfect that people used to wonder how such a small boy could perform such acts? On digging the mound a maginificent throne with 32 dolls/fairies was unearthed............you have to take this forward friends.Enjoy.

Name: authorneelesh
Title: in a smashan
Review: this is a smashan bhairav temple.we went to it because we were told it is very good but can be avoided since there is nothing great about it and it is too off the normal track

Name: uday s
Title: The temple has a history
Review: This shrine was partially open when we visited it. Though it is quite famous, our guide could not explain it's history in detail.

Name: Phb0414
Title: must visit for me in ujjain
Review: i am born and brought up in ujjain... since my childhood days we have been visiting this temple every sunday... though many changes have taken plce since then... its one of the oldest temple in ujjain in bhairavgarh near kal bhairav temple....

Name: Jitesh A
Title: Vikrant bhairav mandir
Review: situated at the bank of kshipra river and near to kal bhairav mandir. Very calm and spiritual place. known for tantri kriyas and all.

Name: perplexed_soul
Title: A temple for Vikramaditya
Review: A good place dedicated to great Ujjaini king Vikramaditya and also his courtesans. It is well decorated during most festivals. Nice place to go out with family.

Name: rahulkumar1411
Title: vikrant bhairav temple
Review: i been there during durga poja and decoration was awsum.durin navratri their bhairav asthmi celebrated,people visit this place during makar sankranti raksha bandhan also

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Relatively new temple dedicated to king Vikramaditya
Review: Located near the Harsiddhi Mata temple it is a relatively new temple dedicated to king Vikramaditya and the nine gems of his court- Kalidas, Amaranth, Shapanak,  Dhanvantri, Varruchi, Varahmihir, Ghatakpar, Shanku and Vetalbhadra.
